item.description:
Fenway Park Celebrates it's 100th Anniversary in style today with a Pre-Game Ceremony not to be missed! 

Join a bunch of us at Scoreboard in Woburn to watch the Red Sox play the New York Yankees in the 100th Anniversary Celebration Game on Friday, April 20. 

A few of us will be there at a reserved table at 1:30 pm for lunch and the Special Pre-Game Ceremonies that begin at 2:00 pm with hundreds of former Red Sox players, executives and heroes expected to be envolved.

Game Time is 3:05pm.

There will be some give-aways from Scoreboard and a local radio station during the game.

If you can, take the day off from work or school or join us right after.

Please RSVP ASAP and indicate approximate arrival time so we may save you a seat at our reserved table(s).

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess For Lauren or Frank or The Natives Reserved Table
item.name: Watch Red Sox vs Yankees 100th Anniversary Celebration Game & Pre-Game Ceremony
